Plinttissa looked up at the gun and laughed.

"Why are you maximals so mean to your own kind?" She asked.

"Radicons, break me out of here." Plintisssa ordered. The radicons linked
together to form Radistor and smashed into the base. Plintissa hopped intol
Radistor's hand and climbed into one of his doors. Radistor looked at all of
the tiny bots and snarled, firing at them all...
----- Original Message -----
From: <KSLawdogg@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, June 07, 2000 6:39 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> Ramhorn:
>
> Ramhorn saluted Liono Prime.  "Yes, sir!" (First good order since I've
joined
> this outfit), he though to himself, getting to a computer.  Fiddling with
the
> controls, he set Plintissa on enemy in the Ark base.  <Prowl, I've noticed
> Plintissa is with you.  Her forces are attacking the Ark, you have orders
to
> take her to a brig immediately.  If she attacks you in any way, shoot to
> kill.  That's an order.  Then get Iron Raptor to a CR chamber ASAP, then
go
> help Striker!  Move!> An autogun from the cieling extended downward, its
> double barrels targeting Plintissa's chest.
>
> Pressing a few more buttons from the bridge, two more autoguns opened fire
on
> Wrath and Kamodia, a missile launcher firing a rocket off at Wrath's
torso.
>
